summary: This film is about an upside down world, where being homosexual is considered "normal" and heterosexual is considered "not normal".
cast: Hristos Hatzipanagiotis|Vladimiros Kiriakidis|Anthem Moss|Kanellina Menouti|Meni Konstantinidou|Christos Yannaris|Katerina Daskalaki|Christina Mitropoulou|Drosos Skotis|Euripides Laskaridis|Fotis Batzas|Elissavet Konstantinidou|Thodoris Atheridis|Alekos Sissovitis|Efi Mouriki|Antigoni Glykofridi|Thomas Paliouras|Sunny Hatziargyri|Anna Monogiou|Panos Stathakopoulos|Giannis Kotsarinis|Nikos Anastasopoulos|Prodromos Tosounidis|Dimitris Menounos|Grigoris Pimenidis|Katerina Mantziou|Maria Antoulinaki|Despoina Malandrenioti|Tasos Mourikis|Lydia Papaioannou|Eleni Kapsampeli|Alina Karasavva|Elina Malama|Dimitris Tselios|Dimitris Protogerakis|Katerina Theodorou|Tasos Gouvitsas|C. Real|Alexander Karmios
director: Directors: Vladimiros Kiriakidis (as Vladimiros Kyriakidis), Efi Mouriki
title: Straight Story
